name: Jeopardy Bot
description: A slack bot that lets you play full Jeopardy! games. For information on how to deploy, visit https://github.com/kesne/jeopardy-bot#deploying-on-heroku.

JBOT_OUTGOING_WEBHOOK_TOKEN.description: The token of the Slack outgoing webhook. Used to verify incoming requests.

JBOT_USERNAME.description: The username you would like the bot to post as.

JBOT_CLUE_TIMEOUT.description: The number of seconds users have to answer questions.
